java/liquibase/database/sql/AddColumnStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 import java.util.Arrays;
00007 import java.util.HashSet;
00008 import java.util.Set;
00009 
00010 public class AddColumnStatement implements SqlStatement {
00011 
00012     private String schemaName;
00013     private String tableName;
00014     private String columnName;
00015     private String columnType;
00016     private Object defaultValue;
00017     private Set<ColumnConstraint> constraints = new HashSet<ColumnConstraint>();
00018 
00019     public AddColumnStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, String columnType, Object defaultValue, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00020         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00021         this.tableName = tableName;
00022         this.columnName = columnName;
00023         this.columnType = columnType;
00024         this.defaultValue = defaultValue;
00025         if (constraints != null) {
00026             this.constraints.addAll(Arrays.asList(constraints));
00027         }
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getTableName() {
00035         return tableName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getColumnName() {
00039         return columnName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public String getColumnType() {
00043         return columnType;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public Set<ColumnConstraint> getConstraints() {
00047         return constraints;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00051         if (isPrimaryKey() && (database instanceof CacheDatabase
00052                 || database instanceof H2Database
00053                 || database instanceof DB2Database
00054                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00055                 || database instanceof SQLiteDatabase)) {
00056             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Adding primary key columns is not supported", this, database);
00057         }
00058 
00059         String alterTable = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD "+ database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " " + database.getColumnType(getColumnType(), isAutoIncrement());
00060 
00061         if (defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00062             alterTable += getDefaultClause(database);
00063         }
00064 
00065         if (primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00066             if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00067                 alterTable += " PRIMARY KEY";
00068             }
00069         }
00070 
00071         if (isAutoIncrement()) {
00072             alterTable += " "+database.getAutoIncrementClause();
00073         }
00074 
00075         if (!isNullable()) {
00076             alterTable += " NOT NULL";
00077         } else {
00078             if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00079                 alterTable += " NULL";
00080             }
00081         }
00082 
00083         if (!primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00084             if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00085                 alterTable += " PRIMARY KEY";
00086             }
00087         }
00088         
00089         if (!defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(database)) {
00090             alterTable += getDefaultClause(database);
00091         }
00092         
00093         return alterTable;
00094     }
00095 
00096     private boolean primaryKeyBeforeNotNull(Database database) {
00097         return !(database instanceof HsqlDatabase);
00098     }
00099 
00100     public boolean isAutoIncrement() {
00101         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00102             if (constraint instanceof AutoIncrementConstraint) {
00103                 return true;
00104             }
00105         }
00106         return false;
00107     }
00108 
00109     public boolean isPrimaryKey() {
00110         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00111             if (constraint instanceof PrimaryKeyConstraint) {
00112                 return true;
00113             }
00114         }
00115         return false;
00116     }
00117 
00118     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00119         return ";";
00120     }
00121 
00122     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00123         return true;
00124     }
00125 
00126     private boolean defaultClauseBeforeNotNull(Database database) {
00127         return database instanceof OracleDatabase
00128                 || database instanceof HsqlDatabase
00129                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00130                 || database instanceof DB2Database
00131                 || database instanceof FirebirdDatabase;
00132     }
00133 
00134     private String getDefaultClause(Database database) {
00135         String clause = "";
00136         if (getDefaultValue() != null) {
00137             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00138                 clause += " CONSTRAINT " + ((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(tableName, getColumnName());
00139             }
00140             clause += " DEFAULT " + database.convertJavaObjectToString(getDefaultValue());
00141         }
00142         return clause;
00143     }
00144 
00145     public boolean isNullable() {
00146         if (isPrimaryKey()) {
00147             return false;
00148         }
00149         for (ColumnConstraint constraint : getConstraints()) {
00150             if (constraint instanceof NotNullConstraint) {
00151                 return false;
00152             }
00153         }
00154         return true;
00155     }
00156 
00157     public Object getDefaultValue() {
00158         return defaultValue;
00159     }
00160 }
